title: Die Sabbati 4‚Å∞ Junij, 1642. It is this day ordered by the Lords and Commons in Parliament, that the deputy-lieutenants of the severall and respective counties within the kingdom of England, and dominion of Wales, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold the next door to the Kings-head in Fleet-street,
notes: Ordered. That deputy-lieutenants of counties not members of the House are to be present at the musters and training of their counties.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Order to be printed: H. Elsing, Cler.Parl.D.Com.
